name: Razerwire:Nanowars
description: A modern revisitation of the 80s arcades. Use your Razerwire to cut through waves of nanobugs with a rogue-like inspired progression.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32bit Processor: i3 Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphic Card Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: i5 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Low-end Graphic Card Storage: 200 MB available space
